full_text:
Page 445

Section 4.
The period of this Executive Assignment shall be for one (1) year, to and including August 6, 2020.

Section 5.
The Assigned State Attorney shall notify the Governor on or before July 6, 2020, if additional time is required.

IN TESTIMONY WHEREOF, I have hereunto set my hand and have caused the Great Seal of the State of Florida to be affixed at Tallahassee, this 6th day of August, 2019.
RON DESANTIS, GOVERNOR
ATTEST:
Laurel M. Lee SECRETARY OF STATE

FILED 2019 AUG - 6 PM 1:20
DEPARTMENT OF STATE
TALLAHASSEE, FLORIDA

DOJ-OGR-00024922

text_blocks.content:
Section 4.
The period of this Executive Assignment shall be for one (1) year, to and including August 6, 2020.

Section 5.
The Assigned State Attorney shall notify the Governor on or before July 6, 2020, if additional time is required.
IN TESTIMONY WHEREOF, I have hereunto set my hand and have caused the Great Seal of the State of Florida to be affixed at Tallahassee, this 6th day of August, 2019.

FILED 2019 AUG - 6 PM 1:20
DEPARTMENT OF STATE
TALLAHASSEE, FLORIDA

additional_notes: The document appears to be an official executive assignment document signed by Governor Ron DeSantis and attested by Secretary of State Laurel M. Lee. The document includes a seal and a filing stamp.
